message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $14,500 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,500?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $12,500 is close, but I need to get at least $13,000 for it to make sense for me.  Do you think you can do $13,000?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to be mindful of the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,750?
